text.div:

text.div:
Days, 10:15 AM to 3 PM, Wed to Fri, until Nov 13
Trains stop at Parkchester.
For service to Buhre Av, Middletown Rd, Westchester Sq, Zerega and Castle Hill Avs,
take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].
For service to St Lawrence Av, Morrison Av-Soundview, Elder and Whitlock Avs,
take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].
For service from these stations take the [6] to Parkchester or Pelham Bay Park and transfer
to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

font.b: Buses Replace Midday Trains between Babylon & Patchogue Thursday, October 22

span.br:
On Thursday, October 22, buses replace midday trains from 9:16 AM to Noon between Babylon & Patchogue for scheduled track inspections to be performed.Â
Eastbound customers will board buses at Babylon for stations Bay Shore through Patchogue and should expect up to 23 minutes additional travel time.
Westbound customers at stations Patchogue through Bay Shore will board buses, up to 12 minutes later than normal train times, to Babylon. Please plan for up to 33 minutes additional travel time. Train service to points west resumes at Babylon.Â
Pick up the special Montauk Branch Sperry Rail Testing Timetable for specific train and bus info, or see http://bit.ly/1M0M9hA.

text.p: To accommodate the final phase of a $5.8 million priority-repair project on Devon Bridge, a new, temporary transfer point --Devon Transfer--has been built where the Waterbury Branch and New Haven Line meet. Track 3, also known as the inbound local track, will be out of service continuously for six months while the work occurs. As a result, starting Monday, May 4th: All Waterbury Branch customers who usually transfer to main line trains at Bridgeport will instead get off at the new Devon Transfer location, cross the walkway, and wait for a train on Track 1, also known as the inbound express track. Waterbury Branch customers who travel to New Haven will transfer again at Bridgeport for a main line train connection to New Haven. Northbound customers will be dropped off main line trains at the Devon Transfer and board a waiting train for Waterbury. See more details at http://bit.ly/1a5iYhwÂ
